name: INTERDIMENSIONAL (RenderQuake Games)
description:
This game was made during Global Game Jam 2022 for the theme DUALITY

THIS GAME IS SEVERELY UNFINISHED!!!! INTERDIMENSIONAL is a Multidimensional (3D and 4D) travel-based puzzle game where shifting/sliding between dimensions takes the front stage. The goal of the game is to solve all of the puzzles and obstacles presented in the game while switching through dimensions to help guide the player through the world or worlds.

CONTROLS
UP, DOWN, LEFT AND RIGHT ARROW KEYS os WASD Keys  to move
SHIFT Key to shift dimensions
R Key to Restart
